Claim: "Polar bears were moving from ice to land earlier and staying on land longer."
Implication: "Polar bears are experiencing starvation due to the decline of their icy hunting grounds."
Referring expressions: Polar bears, ice, land, longer  Polar bears, icy hunting grounds
Formula: (exists a (IsOnLand(a) and (IsMovingFromIceToLand(a) and IsStayingOnLandLonger(a)))) -> (exists e (exists a (IsOnIcyHuntingGrounds(e) and IsExperiencingStarvation(a))))
